member.name: IBlockingLock.Lock
member.summary: Requests a lock on a shared resource.
member.param: The time interval after which the attempted lock operation fails.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IBlockingLock.Unlock
member.summary: Releases a lock on a shared resource.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IBlockingLock
member.summary: Provides a semaphore that can be used to provide temporarily exclusive access to a shared resource such as a file.
